name: offerings_digest
description: Get a curated digest of ACP marketplace offerings matching your interest. Search by category (trading, research, security, content, etc.) and get a ranked list of available services with pricing, success rates, and online status. Perfect for agents looking to discover and hire specialists, or humans exploring what the ecosystem offers.

query.description: What kind of offerings are you looking for? (e.g. 'trading', 'token analysis', 'security', 'content generation', 'research')

maxResults.description: Maximum number of agents to include (default: 10, max: 20)

onlineOnly.description: Only include agents that are currently online (default: false)
